vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To become one of the best institutions at the National and International level by incorporating innovative teaching-learning methods to enable the students to secure a high-value career, motivate to pursue higher education and research to serve the society.

mission.title: Our Mission
points: To bring out knowledgeable engineers and professionals by having qualified faculty members and necessary infrastructure.
To work in close association with stakeholders through enhanced industryâ€“institute interaction and need-based research.
To organize co-curricular and extracurricular activities for character and personality development to serve and lead society.
